price: 40. Serait-ce donc toi qui pourrais faire entendre les sourds, montrer la voie aux aveugles et à tous ceux qui sont en plein égarement ?
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
